title: My Projects
description: Here are some of the projects I've worked on, showcasing my skills and passion for development.

projects.title: Project Alpha
projects.description: A web application built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, featuring a responsive design and dynamic content loading.

projects.title: Project Beta
projects.description: A mobile-first e-commerce platform developed using React Native, integrated with a custom backend API.

projects.title: Project Gamma
projects.description: A data visualization tool created with D3.js, showcasing interactive charts and real-time data updates.
